title: Sewing Time Fan/Light Pull
features: Made of 1/8" thick glazed precision laser-cut acrylic with a beautiful shine. Design is on both sides.
Includes a polished 6" steel chain that will easily attach to your existing fan chain.
Round Shaped and Easy to clean / Fan Pull measures 2" in diameter. Transform the mundane into the extraordinary with our acrylic fan pulls, turning your ceiling fans into artistic focal points.

Unlike Porcelain, Ceramic, etc. if they bang together or drop on the floor they will never chip or shatter. The durable acrylic construction ensures longevity, allowing you to enjoy the exquisite artwork on your fan pull for years to come.
Easy to install, these fan pulls are a hassle-free way to infuse artistry into your surroundings.
description: Add a splash of color or some fun designs to your ceiling fan. Our pulls feature vibrant crisp designs and are made of beautiful high-quality strong 1/8" Thick glazed precision laser-cut acrylic with a beautiful shine. Each pull has been sealed with a UV-resistant coating to protect it from any sun damage or fading. Simple to install and includes both the chain and connector. We guarantee your complete satisfaction or money back. We are sure you will be delighted with these unique items.
